data.message:
Breaking News

A Tsunami warning is in effect for the entire Pacific Coast after a major eathquake hits off the coast of Japan.

Waves between 6 feet and nearly 8 feet is in effect from Seaside to the north to Crescent City to the south.

Officials say do NOT go to the coast to see the waves.

Seek higher ground and evacuate if at all possible.

The first wave is scheduled to hit around 6:15.

Crescent City is expecting a wave greater than 7 feet.
